body:
Stone Age campaigns feature standard weapons and armor made of bone, obsidian, and stone. Leather, hide, padded, and wooden armor and wooden shields are also available.

The following weapons are also available in Stone Age campaigns.
name: Stone Age Weapons and Armor
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Primitive Armor and Weapons/The Stone Age/Stone Age Weapons and Armor
